mapper.update:
update question_db_info
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
question_stem = #{questionStem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
option = #{option,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
answer = #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
analysis = #{analysis,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator_date = #{creatorDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and question_db_id = #{questionDbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
